knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
forecaster <- read.csv("forecastersdata.csv")
```


###Q1
```{r}
reg.1 <-lm(data=forecaster, Actual.Price ~ Taylor)
summary(reg.1)
```
```{r}
reg.2 <-lm(data=forecaster, Actual.Price ~ Rose)
summary(reg.2)
```
```{r}
reg.3 <-lm(data=forecaster, Actual.Price ~ Hazel)
summary(reg.3)
```

##Q2
```{r}
reg.4 <-lm(data=forecaster, Actual.Price ~ Hazel+Rose)
summary(reg.4)
```
```{r}
reg.5 <-lm(data=forecaster, Actual.Price ~ Hazel+Taylor)
summary(reg.5)
```

```{r}
reg.6 <-lm(data=forecaster, Actual.Price ~ Rose+Taylor)
summary(reg.6)
```
```{r}
reg.7 <-lm(data=forecaster, Actual.Price ~ Rose+Taylor+Hazel)
summary(reg.7)
```
